main.name: Deonte Archie
main.bio: Hello, I am Deonte Archie I am very interested in mobile design, UI/UX and Machine Learning. I am located in Charlotte NC and am experienced in creating web properties for our local clients , student creating their portfolios, train new coders and working with small to mid-sized companies desiring to freshen up their websites. I am also versed in setting up SEO and marketing for their web applications. I am versed in React, Nodejs and Python. Lets speak I would love to assist you in your next web project.

education.degree: Continue getting my Bachelor's Degree, Computer Science
education.graduated: expect to graduate in july of 2024

education.school: University of North Carolina at Charlotte - UNCC

work.title: Digital Web Developer
work.description: Implementing new content to the Hornets website and also maintaining it.

work.title: jr Web Consultant
work.description: Create new websites for clients and also maintaning webisites for existing clients

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
